articles.title: Background Conversation feature on OpenAI's ChatGPT mobile app: What is it and how it's important - The Times of India
articles.description: TECH NEWS : OpenAI has updated its ChatGPT mobile app with Background Conversation feature, preparing for GPT-4o Voice launch soon.
